name: maslow-gpt-api-v2
description: An npm package for demonstration purposes using TypeScript to build for both the ECMAScript Module format (i.e. ESM or ES Module) and CommonJS Module format (CJS). It can be used in Node.js and browser applications.

scripts.reset-main-branch: git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am "First commit ;-)" && git branch -D main && git branch -m main && git push -f --set-upstream origin main
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin https://github.com/MaslowCorporation/maslow-gpt-api-v2.git && git push -u origin main
scripts.push: (git add . && git commit -m "I'm a bigger pusher than Ice-T homie !!!" && git push) || exit 0
scripts.start-server-win10: concurrently "node ./index.js" "npm run redis-server-win10" "npm run redis-cli-win10" "npm run worker" "npm run stripe"
scripts.start-server-unix: concurrently "node ./index.js" "npm run redis-server-unix" "npm run redis-cli-unix" "npm run worker" "npm run stripe"
